CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 15, 1962, pg. 1, reads: "All-Day 'Rights' Probe Reveals Pittsburgh Suffering from Bias - Participants - Elma Jean Dukovic (left) the conference chairman; Dr. Earl Belle Smith, president of the Catholic Interracial Council of Pittsburgh, and Walter Worthington, executive director of the Western Pennsylvania Research and Historical Society, and a conference speaker, are shown during a recess at the recent conference - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Elma Jane Dukovic, Dr. Earl Belle Smith, and Walter Worthington holding brochure inscribed "Pittsburgh's Negro," in Penn Sheraton for the Catholic Interracial Council of Pittsburgh civil rights rally
